segments.text: We've been cramming for tomorrow's history exam since early this morning . What do you say we take a break and listen to some music , okay ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Now that you mention it , I'm getting a little bumed-out from studying nonstop , too . Listening to some music for a while would suit me just fine .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: While you're picking out a record to play , I'll grab a couple of beers out of the refrigerator .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You sure have a lot of discs here .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I've got everything from rock n ' roll to the latest new - wave stuff .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: To tell you the truth , I'm strictly into classical music . You don't happen to have any Bach or Mozart , do you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sorry , my taste in music doesn't go back any further than the 1960 ' s . Music written before then is just history to me .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , speaking of history , let's get back to the books.We ' Ve got an exam tomorrow , remember ?
segments.speaker: S2
